com.jjoe64.graphview

Class LegendRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jjoe64.graphview.LegendRenderer

  • public class LegendRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    The default renderer for the legend box

        y - y coordinates in pixel
